column1: in memory of edward velvin dyson -- lindsey funeral home| in memoriam of edward velvin dyson facts. born: october 21
column3: 2015 send card. edward velvin dyson. october 21
column7: of paducah died on friday june 12
column8: 2015 at his residence. mr. dyson was a former laborer with midwest farms dairy and a member of reidland united methodist church. surviving is one son
column9: kent dyson of paducah; one daughter
column11: tn; seven grandchildren; and eleven great-grandchildren. he was preceded in death by his wife
column13: gary dyson; three brothers; and one sister. his parents were luther clyde and ellen gladys. services will be held at a later date. lindsey funeral home of paducah is in charge of arrangements.
